overview:
Ted Stavropoulos joined Rivet in December of 2008, bringing with him over 20 years of experience of delivering solutions for accounting and finance professionals.

Tedâ€™s background includes Technical Sales, Program Management, Product Planning, Product Marketing, Partner Management, Business Development, Management Accounting and Accounting/Reporting Systems Implementations.

Before joining the Rivet team, Ted spent 12 years at Microsoft and FRx Software. The last 3 years Ted spent in the Microsoft Server and Tools Business where he led the strategic engagement with industry analysts for Windows Server 2008 and virtualization leading up to the launch. During his time in the Microsoft Business Division and FRx Ted was instrumental in driving the growth of FRx by increasing the number of partners over 500%. While leading product planning Ted defined advanced reporting capabilities, dashboards and integrated the acquisition of budgeting and planning applications to the FRx product line. After moving to Redmond, WA Ted shifted focus to researching end user needs of BI solutions in ERP systems. Prior to Microsoft / FRx Ted also gained valuable experience at KaPRE software, Summit consulting and BDO Seidman.
